full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RJE BTZUN RDO RJE RNAL 'BYOR MA N'A RO MKHA' SPYOD KYI BSNYEN YIG PADMA R'A GA'I 'PHRENG MDZES ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @021A *, ,(CES RJE BTZUN RDO RJE RNAL 'BYOR MA N'A RO MKHA' SPYOD KYI BSNYEN PA BYA TSUL PADMA R'A GA'I PHRENG MDZES ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, RNAM GA-YENGS KYI KHOL POR GYI NAR 'KHYAMS BA'I BTZUN GZUGS DHARMA BADZRA RAM BLO BZANG CHOS KYI NYI MA ZHES BGYI BAS HA CANG SPROS PA DOR NAS DON GYI NGO BO TZAM GO BDE BAR DBEN PA'I RI SUL BDE CHEN CHOS GLING DU SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DGE TSUL RGYAL MTSAN GRAGS PA'O, ,'DIS KYANG BDAG GZHAN SEMS CAN THAMS CAD HE RU KA YAB YUM GYIS RJES SU 'DZIN PA GYUR CIG, ,,)
